tasks.name: Environment set up
tasks.description:
Clone the repo or create a new one. 
 Install the dependencies and run the app.

tasks.name: Design Component Hierarchy
tasks.description:
Establish a clear component structure for the app.
 Keep it simple by starting with the main components: `TodoForm`, `TodoList`, `TodoItem`

tasks.name: Display List of Todos
tasks.description: Implement TodoList component that will render the list of items./n Ensure keys are used correctly for list items to help React identify which items have changed.

tasks.name: TodoItem Component
tasks.description: Create TodoItem component that receives props and displays the content

tasks.name: New Todo Functionality
tasks.description: Create a form in the TodoForm component to add new todos

tasks.name: Update Todo Functionality
tasks.description: Allow users to mark todos as complete

tasks.name: Remove Todo Functionality
tasks.description: Enable the deletion of todos from the list

tasks.name: Add Style
tasks.description: Add CSS styling to the app for better visual appeal
